name: IntravenousRoute
title: Intravenous route
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent the route by which a medication is administered, in this case an intravenous route.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) attribute related to Route. The intent of this data element is to identify the route by which a medication is administered, in this case an intravenous route. ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with identifying an intravenous route for giving a medication. Codes used are to be SNOMED CT codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
